txt.en: 'For the best beer in the Northfarthing, of course!'
'Say what you will, but there goes a Took who knows how to get free beer.'
Visiting Took
Innkeeper
'Reginard! How long has it been since you were last in Brockenborings?'
'He's just upset about all the spiders in his quarry.'
'Did you find it?'
'If you don't like the tales, why do you come to the Plough and Stars, anyway?'
Miner From Scary
Sheep Farmer
Sheep Farmer
Sheep Farmer
'Too long, my friends, too long!'
'Well, if you're sure you want to hear the story...'
'It was a warm day in early Spring, and my feet were itching for a walk.'
'All my usual haunts were too familiar. I wanted Adventure!'
'Well, if it isn't Reginard Took!'
'Could be, could be. Still, I wanted something. I wanted excitement!'
'Go on, tell us about your travels, Reginard.'
'It found me, Posco! But my throat's a little too dry to keep talking....'
Waiter
'Don't listen to him. We love your stories!'
'Ah, that's better! Now, where was I?'
'Then you'll be sure to look forwards to my next visit!'
'Let me buy you a drink, Reginard!'
'You're right about that!'
'But you haven't told us anything, Reginard!'
'Well, I think it's about time I headed home, friends.'
Patron
'I don't. We've got troubles enough without worrying about foreign parts.'
'You'd be upset if the vile things started interfering with your livelihood, too!'
'Ha! You've gone soft in the head, if you weren't to begin with!'
'You were about to make up a bunch of nonsense.'
